instructions: # [Prose Descriptive Qualities (PDQ)](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/28913/Prose-Descriptive-Qualities-PDQ-System-Core-Rules)* by [Atomic Sock Monkey](http://atomicsockmonkey.com/freebies.asp)* Roll20 character sheet by [hbCyber](https://hbcyber.site)**Features:*** Convenient tracking of damage, downshifts and upshifts applied to Qualities.* Rolling the dice automatically takes into account all modifiers.* Automated notification if a Quality is reduced lower than Poor.* Chat button to output Qualities to chat without rolling.
